node.doctext:
[% #stolen from 'nodeball display page' my $themeEKW = getNode('ekw theme','theme'); return 'Ack! Can\'t find ekw theme!' unless $themeEKW; my $str = linkNode($themeEKW)."\n"; my $GROUP; return 'Ack! ekw theme doesn\'t have group thingies!
'.$str unless ($GROUP=$$themeEKW{group}); $str .= "

    \n"; foreach my $N (@$GROUP) { $N = $DB->getNodeById($N, 'light'); $str .= '
  • ' . linkNode($N) . "($$N{type}{title})\n"; } $str."
\n

"; %]
node.title: ekw
